title: RITO HELP ME
body: RITO I JUST GOT KICKED OFF FROM NA SERVERS FIX THIS PLS... If Marc M. is reading this pls give me a little rp for compensation{{item:3683}}

replies.body:
Ooooooo if Daddy Merrill is reading this I hope he notices me too!!!!

Anywho, down the business. We've noticed some players have been having problems getting connected lately. Some have been able to get back to normal by following the steps in our [**sticky post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu), but let me know if none of that is helping!!
Well DNS changes didn't help for me. Is there a quicker way you could help instead of sending a ticket?

You could try using a VPN as well to see if that helps. There's another method as well that our tech guys have been using to help others, but it needs to be done in a specific way or something could go wrong. Hit them up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can walk you through it.
